about_the_game:
Witch Slide is a free to play, co-operative (1-4 players), sliding and dodging game where you leave your village with great haste to find what has corrupted the nearby forest. While on your way it's easy to get into trouble - together with your friends you must find your way through puzzles and escape danger.

Co-op Campaign
The campaign can be played solo or with up to 4 players. The game is designed to allow you to all play smoothly from anywhere in the world without any input latency.

Mobile Cross-Play
Witch slide will be coming to the Google Play and Apple App Stores soon and will allow you to cross play with friends on PC while on the go.

Please Wishlist or join the to be updated and play for free on release!




Special thanks to the original creators of this genre for all the fun over many years. Witch Slide is inspired by the Area of Ice Escape, Murloc Slide, and Ice Baneling Escape maps from Warcraft III and Starcraft II.
